      • buildScorerModel

        public static void buildScorerModel(java.lang.String inputpath,
                    java.lang.String outputpath,
                    java.lang.String modelpath,
                    java.lang.String classifierName,
                    java.lang.String[] classifierOptions,
                    java.lang.String targetAttributeName,
                    boolean doEvaluate)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        inputpath: - path of arff file containing results training instances
        outputpath: - path to write training statistics
        modelpath: - path to write trained model
        classifierName: - Weka classifier class name
        classifierOptions: - parameters of classifier
        targetAttributeName: - attribute name of target e.g., "correct"
        doEvaluate: - perform 10 fold cross-validation evaluation of model after training
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
